name: argocd_app_condition
help: Report Applications conditions. It contains the conditions currently present in the application status.

name: argocd_app_info
help: Information about Applications. It contains labels such as `sync_status` and `health_status` that reflect the application state in Argo CD.

name: argocd_app_k8s_request_total
help: Number of Kubernetes requests executed during application reconciliation.

name: argocd_app_labels
help: Argo Application labels converted to Prometheus labels. Disabled by default. Labels depend on configuration.

name: argocd_app_orphaned_resources_count
help: Number of orphaned resources per application.

name: argocd_app_reconcile
help: Application reconciliation performance in seconds.

name: argocd_app_sync_total
help: Counter for application sync history.

name: argocd_appset_info
help: Information about Application Sets. Labels: name, namespace, Resource_update_status.

name: argocd_appset_labels
help: Applicationset labels translated to Prometheus labels (disabled by default).

name: argocd_appset_owned_applications
help: Number of applications owned by the applicationset.

name: argocd_appset_reconcile
help: Application reconciliation performance in seconds. Labels: name, namespace.

name: argocd_cluster_api_resource_objects
help: Number of k8s resource objects in the cache.

name: argocd_cluster_api_resources
help: Number of monitored Kubernetes API resources.

name: argocd_cluster_cache_age_seconds
help: Cluster cache age in seconds.

name: argocd_cluster_connection_status
help: The k8s cluster current connection status.

name: argocd_cluster_events_total
help: Number of processes k8s resource events.

name: argocd_cluster_info
help: Information about cluster.

name: argocd_cluster_labels
help: Cluster labels as Prometheus labels (configurable, disabled by default).

name: argocd_commitserver_commit_pending_request_total
help: Number of pending commit requests.

name: argocd_commitserver_commit_request_duration_seconds
help: Commit requests duration seconds.

name: argocd_commitserver_commit_request_total
help: Number of commit requests performed by commit server.

name: argocd_commitserver_git_request_duration_seconds
help: Git requests duration seconds.

name: argocd_commitserver_git_request_total
help: Number of git requests performed by commit server.

name: argocd_commitserver_userinfo_request_duration_seconds
help: Userinfo requests duration seconds.

name: argocd_git_fetch_fail_total
help: Number of git fetch requests failures by repo server.

name: argocd_git_request_duration_seconds
help: Git requests duration seconds.

name: argocd_git_request_total
help: Number of git requests performed by repo server.

name: argocd_kubectl_client_cert_rotation_age_seconds
help: Age of kubectl client certificate rotation.

name: argocd_kubectl_dns_resolution_duration_seconds
help: Latency of kubectl resolver.

name: argocd_kubectl_exec_pending
help: Number of pending kubectl executions.

name: argocd_kubectl_exec_plugin_call_total
help: Number of kubectl exec plugin calls.

name: argocd_kubectl_exec_total
help: Number of kubectl executions.

name: argocd_kubectl_rate_limiter_duration_seconds
help: Latency of kubectl rate limiter.

name: argocd_kubectl_request_duration_seconds
help: Latency of kubectl requests.

name: argocd_kubectl_request_retries_total
help: Number of kubectl request retries.

name: argocd_kubectl_request_size_bytes
help: Size of kubectl requests.

name: argocd_kubectl_requests_total
help: Result of kubectl requests.

name: argocd_kubectl_response_size_bytes
help: Size of kubectl responses.

name: argocd_kubectl_transport_cache_entries
help: Number of kubectl transport cache entries.

name: argocd_kubectl_transport_create_calls_total
help: Number of kubectl transport create calls.

name: argocd_proxy_extension_request_duration_seconds
help: Request duration in seconds between the Argo CD API server and the proxy extension backend.

name: argocd_proxy_extension_request_total
help: Number of requests sent to the configured proxy extensions.

name: argocd_redis_request_duration
help: Redis requests duration.

name: argocd_redis_request_duration_seconds
help: Redis requests duration seconds.

name: argocd_redis_request_total
help: Number of redis requests executed during application reconciliation.

name: argocd_repo_pending_request_total
help: Number of pending requests requiring repository lock.

name: argocd_resource_events_processed_in_batch
help: Number of resource events processed in batch.

name: argocd_resource_events_processing
help: Time to process resource events in batch in seconds.

name: grpc_server_handled_total
help: Total number of RPCs completed on the server, regardless of success or failure.

name: grpc_server_msg_sent_total
help: Total number of gRPC stream messages sent by the server.
